a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Shown is the absolute number of deaths of children under the age of 5, by cause.
Source: IHME Global Burden of Disease
Note: The number of live births has increased over this period. It is useful to compare <a href="/grapher/global-child-mortality-timeseries">deaths
as a share of live births.
